hadiths.text: Narrated Rafi` 'bin Khadij and Sahl bin Abi Hathma:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) forbade the sale of Muzabana, i.e. selling of fruits for fruits, except in the case of 'Araya; he allowed the owners of 'Araya such kind of sale

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَكُونُ لَهُ مَمَرٌّ، أَوْ شِرْبٌ فِي حَائِطٍ أَوْ فِي نَخْلٍ
chapter.eng-name: To pass through a garden or to have a share in datepalms
